annotations.description: This is what football should look like. Full of action, thrilling moments and spectacular opportunities. The expectations for the next games will be high. The superiority of the home team was evident on the pitch today. The home team tried to constantly keep their opponents under pressure. Despite that, the away team made a lot of passes and attempted to maintain possession.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee checks his watch and blows his whistle to signal the end of this match.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Alejandro Gomez walks off the pitch and Cristian Raimondi (Atalanta) comes on as a substitute.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) sends in the corner, but fails to find the head of any of his teammates, allowing the defence to clear.
Decent spell from AS Roma here and they keep the pressure on until one of the defending players steps in. The linesman points to the corner flag, AS Roma are going to take it.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: We will have 4 min. of added time.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Franck Kessie (Atalanta) makes no mistake from the penalty spot after firing the ball into the bottom left corner of the goal to give the goalkeeper no chance!
Franck Kessie (Atalanta) is heading towards the penalty spot to take it.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: A yellow card for a tackle by Edin Dzeko (AS Roma). Riccardo Di Fiore doesn't hesitate at all to make this decision.

annotations.label: penalty
annotations.description: Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) was trying to get to the ball but clattered into the legs of the opponent as well. Riccardo Di Fiore blows his whistle for an infringement. The referee uncompromisingly points to the spot and it's a penalty to Atalanta.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Remo Freuler (Atalanta) takes the corner, but the opposition's defence is ready and clears the ball to safety.
The Atalanta players are exchanging some short passes and control the game at the moment, but one of the defending players steps in and intercepts the ball.
Golden chance! Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) meets a cross in the box and finds some space for a shot. He produces an inaccurate effort that goes wide of the right post.

annotations.label: funfact
annotations.description: The current number of shots on goal is 6:5.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Substitution. Radja Nainggolan makes way for Juan Iturbe (AS Roma).

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Wojciech Szczesny comes off his line to intercept the corner from Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta).

Roberto Gagliardini (Atalanta) misses a good chance to score. An inch perfect cross into the box finds Roberto Gagliardini (Atalanta) who rises for a header, but sends the ball well over the bar. The referee signals a corner kick to Atalanta.
Marco D'Alessandro (Atalanta) wins the ball from the corner kick and strikes. The effort lacks accuracy and flies wide of the target.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) will deliver the corner kick.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) takes the corner kick and sends the ball among a huddle of players inside the penalty area, but one of the defenders clears it to safety. Atalanta will have a chance to score from a corner kick.

Remo Freuler (Atalanta) attempts to find one of his teammates inside the box with a chip pass, but one of the defending players reacts superbly and intercepts the ball. The ball is out of play and the linesman points at the corner flag. Corner to Atalanta.
Leandro Paredes (AS Roma) brings an opponent down and Riccardo Di Fiore interrupts the game.
Some neat passing and movement from Atalanta as they ping around some short passes in order to create a new attacking opportunity.
Remo Freuler (Atalanta) expertly controls a neat clever pass inside the box, but his effort crashes against the right post! What an opportunity that was!

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) swings in a dangerous cross from the resulting corner kick, but none of his teammates manage to outjump the defence.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) steps up to take the corner, but the ball just sails in among the defenders. Good work from Atalanta as they win a corner.
A fine lofted pass into the box, sent by Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta), is intercepted by the opposition's defence. The linesman makes the right call and Atalanta will have a corner.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner from Marco D'Alessandro (Atalanta) is cleared away by the defence.

Marco D'Alessandro (Atalanta) races towards goal but the defender gets back well to make a challenge. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Atalanta will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.
Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) sprays a pass out to Ervin Zukanovic, but he can't beat his man inside the box.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Today's match ends for Diego Perotti who will be replaced by Leandro Paredes (AS Roma).

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) takes the corner but fails to find any of his teammates.

Andrea Petagna (Atalanta) attempts to set up his teammate with a scoring opportunity by chipping in a fine pass from the edge of the box, but one of the defenders intercepts his effort. Atalanta earn a corner.

annotations.label: funfact
annotations.description: 21:9 – this is the total number of shots produced by both teams.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) takes the corner and sends it into the penalty area, but the opposition's defence is ready and makes a good clearance.
Atalanta spell of possession comes to an end after a mistake. The ball goes out of play. Atalanta are awarded a corner kick.
Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) misses a good chance to score. An inch perfect cross into the box finds Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) who rises for a header, but sends the ball well over the bar.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) launches a powerful cross from the corner into the box, but the ball is intercepted by the defender.

Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) plays a dangerous chip pass into the box in an attempt to set up one of his teammates, but the effort is intercepted by one of the defenders. The referee points to the corner flag. It's a corner to Atalanta.

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: What a brilliant finish! Mattia Caldara (Atalanta) latches on to an inch perfect cross into the box and fires the ball past the helpless goalkeeper.
AS Roma are seeing far more of the ball now.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Luciano Spalletti has decided to make a change. Stephan El Shaarawy (AS Roma) replaces Mohamed Salah.

Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) weaves through the defence with ease and gets one on one with the keeper, but fails to score with his strike towards the top left corner as Wojciech Szczesny produces a good save.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: Remo Freuler (Atalanta) joins the action as a substitute, replacing Jasmin Kurtic.
Wojciech Szczesny produces a crucial save to deny a close range header from Rafael Toloi (Atalanta) after a cross. A top class save by the keeper.
The defence had a hard time blocking out the strike from Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta). He didn't hesitate and finished from outside the box right after he had received a pass from his teammate.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: Kevin Strootman (AS Roma) is awarded a yellow card for his tackle. He doesn't seem to agree with the decision, but Riccardo Di Fiore ignores the protests.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: A dangerous looking corner kick from Diego Perotti (AS Roma) is cleared to safety by the defence.
Edin Dzeko (AS Roma) slaloms his way past challenges, but an opposing player does well to get the ball away. The ball goes out of play and AS Roma have been awarded a corner kick.
Jasmin Kurtic (Atalanta) breaks past challenges inside the box, but puts too much pace on his pass to Alejandro Gomez.

annotations.label: substitution
annotations.description: We are about to witness a substitution. Marco D'Alessandro (Atalanta) is replacing Andrea Masiello.
The ball is cleared after Daniele De Rossi (AS Roma) attempted to dribble past an opposing player. The ball has crossed the sideline. Atalanta are taking a throw in.
Leonardo Spinazzola (Atalanta) sends a long ball across the pitch, but it misses its target.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: Riccardo Di Fiore blows his whistle and the second half starts.

There has not been much to choose between the sides after an absorbing 45 minutes. Let's hope they can continue in the same vein in the second period. The first half was definitely edged by the visiting team. The home team is playing possession football, while the away side press a lot which puts the opposition in difficult situations.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The referee blows his whistle for half time, bringing to a close the first 45 minutes of the match.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The corner from Mohamed Salah (AS Roma) is hurriedly cleared.
Bruno Peres (AS Roma) serves up a nice cross, but the defence clears the danger. AS Roma have been awarded a corner kick.

annotations.label: time
annotations.description: There will be a minimum of 1 min. of added time.
Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) misses a good chance to score. An inch perfect cross into the box finds Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) who rises for a header, but sends the ball well over the bar.

annotations.label: penalty
annotations.description: AS Roma are given a penalty!

annotations.label: soccer-ball
annotations.description: Diego Perotti (AS Roma) smoothly converts the penalty with a beautiful low drive into the left side of the net.
Diego Perotti (AS Roma) will take the responsibility and he is already preparing the ball.

annotations.label: y-card
annotations.description: That will be a yellow card for one of the players. The one who gets booked is Rafael Toloi (Atalanta).

annotations.label: penalty
annotations.description: Rafael Toloi (Atalanta) touches the ball with his hand. It's a penalty! AS Roma have an opportunity to score from the penalty spot.
AS Roma string together a series of short passes.
Andrea Petagna (Atalanta) gathers a nice lofted pass deep inside the box and attempts to put the ball into the middle of the goal, but his shot is deflected away by one of the defending players.
Andrea Petagna (Atalanta) pulls the jersey of one of the opposition players and Riccardo Di Fiore blows his whistle for a foul.
Bruno Peres (AS Roma) misses a good chance to score. An inch perfect cross into the box finds Bruno Peres (AS Roma) who rises for a header, but sends the ball well over the bar.
Antonio Rudiger (AS Roma) tries to send a low pass into the box, but it's blocked and cleared. The referee and the linesman both signal a throw in for Atalanta.
The game is interrupted as Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) is flagged offside.
Lovely run from Mohamed Salah (AS Roma). He finds himself one on one with the goalkeeper, lines up a shot but the keeper boldly launched himself to intercept the ball.
Edin Dzeko (AS Roma) latched on to a lofted pass inside the box, but his header misses to the right of the target.
Mohamed Salah (AS Roma) should know this behaviour is beyond the rules. He was too careless with his challenge and left Riccardo Di Fiore no option but to blow his whistle.
Roberto Gagliardini (Atalanta) latched on to an accurate pass deep into the box and attempted to fire the ball past the keeper, but the shot is way off target. What a miskick!

Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) finds his teammate, who is lurking close to the offside line, with a nice through pass. The opponent's defence is having a really hard time dealing with these kind of situations.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The resulting corner from Diego Perotti (AS Roma) only finds one of the defenders, who heads it out of danger.
Mohamed Salah (AS Roma) goes on a solo run, but he fails to create a chance as an opposition player blocks him. The ball is out of play and AS Roma manage to earn a corner.
Edin Dzeko (AS Roma) makes a strong challenge and Riccardo Di Fiore blows for a foul.

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: Etrit Berisha leaps to collect the ball from the corner which was sent over by Diego Perotti (AS Roma).

annotations.label: corner
annotations.description: The ball is whipped in from the corner by Mohamed Salah (AS Roma), but one of the defenders gets it clear. The referee points to the corner flag and AS Roma will take a corner.
A cross by Diego Perotti (AS Roma) from the side of the pitch flies into the box, but fails to find its intended target as the aim was poor. The ball is out of play. AS Roma win a corner kick.
Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) gets inside the penalty area and sends a powerful shot that almost ends inside the net. The keeper is alert and makes a good save.
Jasmin Kurtic (Atalanta) latched on to an accurate pass deep into the box and attempted to fire the ball past the keeper, but the shot is way off target. What a miskick!
Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) came close to scoring. He connected with a pass inside the box and perhaps should have done better than direct his shot straight at Wojciech Szczesny.
Alejandro Gomez (Atalanta) commits an ugly challenge. The referee sees it and immediately blows his whistle.

annotations.label: whistle
annotations.description: The match has just started.
Atalanta will kick off.
Let us introduce today's referee to you, and it's Riccardo Di Fiore.
